3: I've successfully retreated from those ruins, but I could never have guessed something like that was left for me.
Chrome, too... He knows full well I'm not familiar with these things.
Lemme think about the place to start writing about...
Even if I slack off a little, it's going to be fine, right?
I found a small portion of Tenebrion on the upper floors of the ruins... making me certain of its existence...
So I went down, and there I saw that peppery girl...
